SEARCH
Module com.ekidroske.kidroske_elise_lms
Package controller

Interface IBookController

All Known Implementing Classes:
LibraryController
public interface IBookController
This interface is used to allow for the application layer to call methods within the controller layer without directly accessing the controller layer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    invokeDeleteConfirmation(String message, Book book)
    Used to get confirmation from the user before deleting the provided book.
    void
    invokeError(String message)
    Used to display an error message.
    void
    invokeMessage(String message)
    Used to display a message.
    void
    invokePreview(ArrayList<Book> newBooks)
    Used to display new books provided by the user before adding them to the library database.
    void
    updateContent(ArrayList<Book> updatedBooks)
    Used to update the controller's observable list.

  • Method Details

    • invokeMessage

      void invokeMessage(String message)
      Used to display a message.
      Parameters:
      message - String message to display.

    • invokeError

      void invokeError(String message)
      Used to display an error message.
      Parameters:
      message - String error message to display.

    • invokeDeleteConfirmation

      void invokeDeleteConfirmation(String message, Book book)
      Used to get confirmation from the user before deleting the provided book.
      Parameters:
      message - String confirmation message.
      book - Book object to be deleted.

    • updateContent

      void updateContent(ArrayList<Book> updatedBooks)
      Used to update the controller's observable list.
      Parameters:
      updatedBooks - Book ArrayList containing books from the library database.

    • invokePreview

      void invokePreview(ArrayList<Book> newBooks)
      Used to display new books provided by the user before adding them to the library database.
      Parameters:
      newBooks - Book ArrayList representing new books to add to library.
